title: [Health] A new study based on 22 FOI requests of over 11,000 pages found that Coca-Cola exerts direct influence on academic institutions and organizations that convene major public health conferences and events, and makes payments directly to speakers and researchers conditional on media interviews

[Health] Interleukin-27 impairs BCG antigen clearance & T cell stimulatory potential by neonatal dendritic cells -- The BCG vaccine is currently the only licensed vaccine available for tuberculosis. Study describes some of its effects on immune system.
